name: 2sbbid
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s2, s3, w1)), wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s2, s3, w2))))

stmt.origin: sbbid(s0, s1, w0, wsb(s2, s3, w1), wsb(s2, s3, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s2, s3, w1)), wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s2, s3, w2))))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(wsb(s2, s3, w1), wsb(s2, s3, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s2, s3, w1)), wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s2, s3, w2))))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(wsb(s2, s3, w1), wsb(s2, s3, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s2, s3, w1), wsb(s2, s3, w2)))
-| wnf(s3, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s2, s3, w1)), wsb(s0, s1, wsb(s2, s3, w2))))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s3, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

comment: Deduction doubly substituting both sides of a biconditional. (Contributed by AV, 30-Jul-2023.)
